name: Lemon Blues
overview: Puzzler in which you must line up the lemons next to each other to beat each level. But all is not as simple as it sounds. A puzzle game published in Magic Disk 64 1994/06. That’s Bodo with the excavator, and he’s still excavating, "it sounds like every year at many carnival events. At Lemon Blues you take on the role of a bulldozer driver. Your goal? Very easily! You have to line up the three yellow lemons with the help of the purple fruits (horizontally or vertically). You can control your excavator with the joystick in port # 2. Also: Lemon movement Move to the fruit and press fire. The fruit will stop at the next wall or the next lemon. Destroying the purple lemon First press fire and then in the direction where the purple lemon is. Attention! It must be on a wall or another lemon. Destroying the Enemies One hit with a lemon is enough to kill these fellows. After each level you will receive a code word that you can enter again the next time you start.
